title: Dawnbringer Icon Issues
body:
Edit: Well the problem solved itself now. It did appear after playing a match.

It seems that this is a common issue going on with the Dawnbringer RIven icon not being given after completing the first mission.

https://68.media.tumblr.com/dd17b49ac7d690c94a69e2a8642e02a0/tumblr_ormbcilB3C1qjhi0ao1_540.png

Plus why does everyone not have that lifesaver tube as the very first icon on the top right corner (besides those never obtaining it)? Is mine just glitch in place there? It's been bugging me ever since I notice how it never lets newer icons take it's place.

replies.body: Sometimes Riven gets a little of a slow start. If you look for that icon now it should be there!

Thanks! As for my other question is Why does that lifegaurd innertube the very first icon on my list? It literally bugs me as it isn't on the exact spot when I earned it and any new icon I gain is always the one next to it, with some exceptions like the Soy Lolero being next to the Project Ashe icon.

Weeeeeiiiiiiird! Typically those icons are organized by release date, so newer icons will always be at the beginning. Since the Yas/Riv icons are the newest ones right now they should be placed at the very beginning.....strange....

I wish there were a way for me to rearrange those icons for you, but sadly I just don't have any way of making that happen =\

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=XFXnhPEA,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-06-16T04:57:12.055+0000)
>
> Weeeeeiiiiiiird! Typically those icons are organized by release date, so newer icons will always be at the beginning. Since the Yas/Riv icons are the newest ones right now they should be placed at the very beginning.....strange....
> 
> I wish there were a way for me to rearrange those icons for you, but sadly I just don't have any way of making that happen =\

For some reason the pool party icons are constantly at the front of the icon list. This is the case for everyone who has them. Not sure why. Might be a bug.
